abstract: 16 things you did n't know you could buy at home depot .
article: you might think of the home depot as a warehouse full of wooden planks you do n't know what to do with and paint you do n't have a project for . but it would serve you well to think again . you do n't need to be renovating your house to visit this wonderland . there are plenty of things you did n't know you could find at home depot that have nothing to do with that pinterest diy project you committed to . i said it . the home depot is a wonderland . it does n't matter if you 're looking to install a fancier toilet or not .

the home depot is not restricted to only those looking to upgrade their toolbox . any visit to the store is an in real life inspiration board experience for the young adult . as a kid helping my dad collect yard work material , i might 've roamed the aisles bored by the barrage of light fixtures , but i have matured into a young adult who 's more likely to head to the home depot before the mall . the store simply stocks everything . you might stumble upon some surprise finds between the insulation and toilet samples .

no matter if you 're looking to positively affect the aesthetic of your favorite room or needing to pack up your adventure bag , there 's plenty of surprising things you 'll find in stock . my new personal favorite weekend activity ? home depot hauls . 23-piece cookie press and food decorator sethutzler 23-piece cookie press and food decorator set , $ 16.67 , the home depotany budding bakers out there ? sure , there are shops dedicated to the craft , but you can find all your baking essentials and then some at home depot . bodega mini tumblr bormioli rocco 7.5 oz .

bodega mini tumbler , $ 18.99 , the home depotthe home depot is all about helping us upgrade the feel good vibe of our humble abodes . if you 're looking to add a touch of style to your tabletop set up , look no further than these tumblers . yes , the home depot can help you work out your very fashionable and adult table set for your now very instagrammable dinner parties . metal camping tool kit set wakeman metal camping tool kit set , $ 29.99 , the home depotokay , it 's a tool kit .

and that might not seem surprising at the home depot . but , it 's not just any old hammer and screw driver toolkit . it 's specific for camping . check out that axe and saw ! if you 're gearing up for an adventure , the home depot might be good place to drop in . 1.5 in . smart watch executive androidlinsay 1.5 in . smart watch executive android , $ 249.99 , the home depotthe home depot might not be a jewelry store exactly , but it 's tech and smart toy game is on point .

you do n't need to go to your wireless provider to find accessories for your android . dream easy queen size raised air mattressair comfort dream easy queen size raised air mattress , $ 88.38 , the home depotit 's not all just concrete boards and paint chips ! if you 're hosting a hoard of your friends for a slumber party and are short a couch , you can find plush air mattresses at the home depot . who knew ! high-end 4 pocket linen butcher apron , naturalasd living high-end 4 pocket linen butcher apron , natural , $ 77 , the home depothold on .

this has surprised me , and i thought i was well acquainted with the place online and in store . i am always in the market for a linen apron . adding `` looking stylish '' as direction number one to any of the recipes you cook from results in tastier meals , i 'm convinced . when you feel good , you cook good . now you can find your next luxurious cooking threads at the home depot . small black extreme-skater casual grip dog sneaker shoes pet life small black extreme-skater casual grip dog sneaker shoes , $ 19.60 , the home depotwant your pet to look as street style ready as you do ?

you can find all your puppy accessories here . resin bocce ballviva sol resin bocce ball , $ 76.47 , the home depotyou can pick up everything you need for your yard work needs , and when you 're done mowing , you can play bocce ball . hey , i 'd categorize that as `` yard work necessity '' . a bonus ? this set comes with a bottle opener . blue chambray woven throwlr resources blue chambray woven throw , $ 27.30 , the home depotneed to get cozy ? you can order throws and bed linens through the home depot !

diy 8 in . terrarium kitsyndicate home garden diy 8 in . terrarium kit , $ 33.32 , the home depotyou might not have the space for an entire garden but still have the desire to work on your green thumb . the home depot is all about that . their garden centers are meccas for those delighted by growing things and you can find little gems like this diy terrarium kit . google home mini chalkgoogle home mini chalk , $ 49 , the home depotgetting insulation ? help your home out further by making it smart . 7.5 ft. pre-lit led energy smart just cut colorado spruce artificial treege 7.5 ft. pre-lit led energy smart just cut colorado spruce artificial tree , $ 43.50 , the home depotyou might not be needing this kind of tree hanging around your house for another few months , but it 's good to know that there are enough artificial tree options to consider the home depot an unofficial , artificial christmas tree farm .

quadripod 26 in . round fire pithampton bay quadripod 26 in . round fire pit , $ 79 , the home depotof course you have your general home appliances . your dishwashers and refrigerators and microwaves . but if you want to go even further , and i mean take it outside , the home depot has an array of outdoor appliances . classic 25 oz . vacuum water bottle in hammertone greenstanley classic 25 oz . vacuum water bottle in hammertone green , $ 17.77 , the home depotneed a water bottle to cut down on disposables ? they 're here to help !

10 in . x 12 in . `` pathway to spring '' canvas wall artptm images 10 in . x 12 in . `` pathway to spring '' canvas wall art , $ 30 , the home depotyes , if you 're in need of wall decor , look no further than the home depot which now doubles as a canvas art dealer happy to help source images for your gallery wall . 14 in . x 6 in . wire and wood coastal baskets stonebriar collection 14 in . x 6 in . wire and wood coastal baskets , $ 48 , the home depotthese are n't your run of the mill storage baskets .
the home depot also supplies homes with decorative baskets perfect for holding blankets in a more aesthetically pleasing way .
